problems.title: Number Triangle Pattern 2
problems.description:
Write a program to print a number triangle pattern of height n where each row contains the row number.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print the pattern as shown in the examples.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3

Sample Output
1
22
333

Explanation:
Row 1 has 1s, Row 2 has 2s, etc.
hintsList: Inner loop prints the current row number.
